column3: 曹贵人带温宜公主前来请安
column6: Your Majesties, Lady Cao is here with Princess Wenyi.

column3: 大热天的带着公主出来
别中了暑气才好 快请进来吧
column6:
I hope they didn't feel unwell
walking under the the blazing sun.
Show her in quickly.

column3: 皇上万福 皇后万福
column6: Grace to Your Majesties.
It's scorching hot at this time.

column3: 你怎么还抱着公主走来走去
column6: Why did you go out with the princess?

column3: 你倒不怕 她受得了吗

column6: Can she handle the heat even if you can stand it?

column3: 只是晨起公主便啼哭不已
column6: I do apologize, Your Majesty.

column3: 想是许久不见皇后娘娘
column6: The princess has been crying for the entire morning.

I thought she must be missing Her Majesty.
[The empress is the nominal mother of all imperial children.]

column3: 罢了 朕也好久不见公主了
column6: No worries, I miss Wenyi as well.
Come here, I'll hold her.

column3: 几日不见 怎么公主抱着轻了些
column6: She seems to have lost weight from last time.

column3: 天气炎热 公主吃不下

column6:
The summer heat spoils her appetite.
She hasn't been eating well lately.
Wenyi is vulnerable to the heat.
I'm afraid the concubines are struggling as well.

How about we move to the
Summer Palace to escape the heat?

column3: 圆明园那边一直打点着

column6:
The Summer Palace is well maintained.
Your Majesty can depart at any time.

column3: 朕也想去那儿住段日子
column6: I'd like to stay there for some time.

I haven't been there for 2 years
due to the mourning period for the prior emperor.

column3: 只是跟着去的妃嫔不多
column6: Moving is not going to be too difficult.

column3: 皇上想哪几个跟着去呀
column6: But the Summer Palace cannot accommodate all the concubines?
Which ones would Your Majesty go with?

column3: 这些皇子公主的生母自然要跟着
column6: They two are out of question.

Mothers of the princes and princesses
will follow to take care of the children.

And Concubine Estime.
That will be all.

column3: 在宫里养病怕是不相宜
column6:
Consort Honnête is in poor health.
She should go with us for her recovery.
(sigh) Of course.
As for Consort Fleur ...
I suggest she stay to take care of the palace.
This hairpin ...

column3: 这个步摇是朕赐给华妃的吧
column6: I remember this is my gist for Consort Fleur.

column3: 华妃娘娘每次戴着这个步摇
column6: Yes,

the princess is always happy to see
Her Highness wearing this hairpin.

column3: 因此华妃便赐予臣妾逗着公主玩
column6: So Her Highness gave it to me to play with Wenyi.
Consort Fleur is going as well.
Certainly.

column3: 是谁的心思竟想得这样妥贴
column6:
Who was the thoughtful mind
to have arranged all this for me?

column3: 皇上知道小主素性爱香

column6:
His Majesty wished to have your room scented
without burning incense on such a hot day.

column3: 因此特意命奴才取新鲜香花

column6:
At His Majesty's behest, we arranged
flowers and the rotating fan for you, My Lady.
What a sweet and cooling breeze!

The rotating fan is exclusive for you
among all the concubines, My Lady.

What an ingenious design!
His Majesty devoted so much thought to it.
During the canicular days [hottest period of the year],

column3: 在殿里放上冰窖里启出的冰块
column6: ice will be sent to your chamber from the ice house.

column3: 那才叫一个舒服透心呢
column6: It will waft coolness to your heart's delight.

column3: 皇上一早吩咐了咱内务府
只要小主一觉热马上就用冰
column6:
His Majesty ordered us to send you ice
immediately you feel hot, My Lady.

We will make the utmost effort
to accommodate your needs, My Lady.

column3: 还得劳烦您去回皇上的话
column6: Thank you for your hard work, Mr Huang.

column3: 说我等一下亲自过去谢恩
column6:
May I trouble you to inform His Majesty that
I will visit him shortly to thank him in person?

column3: 小主这话奴才怎么敢担当
column6: With the greatest pleasure, My Lady.

column3: 怕是要去引见楼练骑射
column6:
But I'm afraid His Majesty
is going to practice mounted archery.

column3: 小主可歇歇再慢慢过去
column6: You might want to go at a later time, My Lady.

column3: 这会儿练骑射 是谁陪着
column6:
Mounted archery?
Who did His Majesty go with?
Noble Prince Guo and Lady Cao.
Lady Cao?

Princess Wenyi has been feeling better.
His Majesty wished to see her.

His Majesty is very fond of the Summer Palace.
I'm excited to be here for the first time.
My Lady, I heard that Consort Honnête came as well.

column3: 咱们还不知道端妃是什么样子呢
column6: I wonder what Her Highness looks like.

column3: 日子处久了 总会照面的
column6:
Consort Honnête has been bed-ridden for years.
We will get to see her sooner or later.
What is it?
What exceptional archery!
The wild pigeons in west Beijing are known for their swiftness.
But the archer caught two pigeons with one shot.

column3: 是皇上在园子里练骑射吗
column6: Peace to Lady Sourire.
Is it His Majesty who is practicing archery?

column3: 皇上与王爷顺手打了野物
column6:
Noble Prince Guo came to visit.
His Lordship hunted game with His Majesty.

column3: 今儿倒是真的果郡王来了

column6: The veritable Noble Prince.

column3: 那日小主与皇上在御花园里初见
column6:
Vermilion told me that His Majesy pretended
to be Noble Prince Guo when he met you in the garden.

column3: 皇上便自称是果郡王来着

column6: Now we get to see the real person.
His Majesty is an excellent archer.

It was Noble Prince Guo.
His Majesty was full of praise for His Lordship's archery skills.

column3: 素闻果郡王擅于琴棋诗画
column6:
Noble Prince Guo is known
for his achievement in the four arts.
It's a surprise that he excels at archery as well.

column3: 咱们王爷呀 会得多着呢
column6:
Ma'am, you'll discover His Lordship's
incredible versatility as you stay longer in the palace.

column3: 小厦子 你快捧了野鸽子去吧
column6:
Xiao-Xiazi, you should bring back
the pigeons immediately.

column3: 说我等下就去勤政殿请安
column6:
And please inform His Majesty that I will pay respect
to him when he returns to the Governance Hall.
Allow me to take my leave.
I remember it was father who taught you archery.

Your Majesty's archery shifu was
the greatest baturu [Machu warrior].

column3: 可并没有学到皇阿玛的真传
column6: My dull mind, however, didn't learn much from father.

column3: 皇阿玛给的是舐犊之情
column6:
What barturu taught was archery skills;
what father gave was parental love.
Father took a greater liking to you.

"Before heaven bestows great responsibilities upon a man,
it frustrates his spirit and will."

column3: 恰恰是皇阿玛的这一偏爱
臣弟倒成了无用之人了
column6:
I ended up being a useless person
because of father's indulgence.

column3: 你今日也累了 早点回去歇息
column6:
You've had a long day.
You should go have some rest.
I shall return to the Governance Hall.
His Majesty is leaving.
I bid Your Majesty goodbye.
Peace and grace to Your Majesty.
Good, you're here.

Prince XVII, with all his might, managed to
acquire half a catty of "snow-grown greens".
It is well worth the effort.
You should try it.
You Majesty seems to be in a great mood.

column3: 生长于极北苦寒之地的险峻山峰
column6:
I heard that the "snow-grown greens" can only
be found on precipices in the farthest north.

There are hardly more than ten trees
of the kind all around the world.

column3: 茶味清新冷冽 极是难得
column6:
Nourished by the snow,
the tea has a refreshingly icy taste.
What efforts must His Lordship have devoted!

- Xiao-Xiazi.
- Yes.

column3: 这一路送来就得费尽心思
column6:
On top of that, he even made the effort
to send me the tea on such a blazing day.
The thought matters more than the gift itself.

column3: 年年如此 可不太费了银子
column6:
His Majesty was concerned about the costs
if he receives the tea every year.

column3: 王爷心思细巧 皇上却心怀大略
column6:
While His Lordship is a thoughtful person,
Your Majesty thinks for the long term.

column3: 这句话可是说到点子上了
column6: Lady Sourire, you hit the nail on the head.

column3: 臣妾听闻 皇上适才与王爷射猎

column6:
I learnt that Your Majesty had just
had an enjoyable hunt with His Lordship.

column3: 怎的转眼就不见了王爷
想必一定听说妹妹貌若天仙
column6: I wonder where His Lordship is.

His Lordship must have heard of your supernal beauty,
so he has to avoid meeting you.
I am immensely flattered.
Your Majesty need not think of an excuse for him.

column3: 定是王爷听闻臣妾貌若无盐
column6:
His Lordship must have known that
I look like Wuyan, the ugly woman from Qi.
So he had to escape before I come.

column3: 你听听 她若是貌若无盐
column6: Did you hear that?

If she looked like Wuyan,
what would the other concubines look like?

column3: 莞妹妹谦虚 皇上听她玩笑呢
column6: Sourire was just joking.
Have some tea.

column3: 入口幽香 神清气爽
column6: This is veritable good tea.
It has a refreshing taste and aroma.
What a thoughtful gift from His Lordship!

column3: 臣妾听闻 皇上当日初见莞贵人
column6: I was told that when Your Majesty first met Sourire,

you made her believe that you were Prince XVII
and enjoyed music with her in the garden.

That led to your happy relationship today,
which is so romantic a tale in the palace.

column3: 这样的细微秘事姐姐也知晓
column6: How did you know of such a private affair?
You must have heard it from His Majesty.
I didn't say anything.

column3: 是琴默心细 自己留神听来的
column6: Qinmo had an attentive ear to have heard the story.

column3: 如此说来 这十七爷
还是皇上与莞妹妹的媒人呢
column6:
In that case, Prince XVII is the
matchmaker for Your Majesty.

column3: 何况这位大媒风流惆镜
朝中多少官宦家的小姐
column6:
Prince Matchmaker is renowned
for his unrestrained talent.

column3: 都倾心不已 日夜得求亲近
column6:
Many a girl from the most distinguished families
admires and desires His Lordship.

column3: 妹妹 想必妹妹在闺阁之中
也听闻过十七爷的盛名吧
column6:
Sourire, I believe you must have heard of
His Lordship in your maiden years.

I was living an isolated life before the Selection,
and held in quarantine after I moved in.
I never had a chance to hear about His Lordship.

Your Majesty is a laureate in literature,
and most considerate to the concubines.

column3: 不知当日是否也做此举

column6:
I wonder if Your Majesty did the same
to approach Lady Cao.

column3: 这个时辰想必温宜也该饿了
column6: Wenyi must be feeling hungry at this time.

column3: 皇上 臣妾先回去瞧瞧
column6: Allow me to go and see to her lunch.
All right.

column3: 温宜病好了以后 老是哭闹不止
column6: Wenyi is still crying a lot lately.

column3: 江太医常为你把平安脉
也让他看看是什么缘故
column6:
Ask Dr Jiang what the problem is
the next time he visits you.

column3: 是 臣妾让江太医瞧过了

column6: Certainly, I will report yo Your Majesty after that.

column3: 这把琴是先帝舒妃的爱物
column6: This zither was treasured by Consort Dowager Serein.

column3: 你来之前朕本想听人弹奏一曲
column6: I was craving for zither music before you arrived.

column3: 可是曹贵人曹琴默人如其名
column6:
But Lady Cao was just aptly like
her name Qinmo [a quiet lyre].
She didn't play well.

column3: 臣妾着人去请眉姐姐来吧
column6: I shall send for Meizhuang.
She is a brilliant zither player.

column3: 眉庄对于曲调的精通在你之上
column6: Meizhuang is able to play faultlessly,

column3: 可是她的曲中缺少情致
column6: but her music is somewhat emotionless.

Emotionless music is dull
however good a zither plays it.

column3: 还是你给朕弹奏一曲吧
column6: Will you play the zither for me.

column3: 那臣妾就为皇上弹奏一曲
column6: With pleasure, Your Majesty.

column3: 果然是极好的琴 音色如此清脆
column6: So crisp and clear is the sound of the zither!

column3: 碧波清风 品茶听琴
column6: A cup of tea with zither as wind ruffles the water.
Such is a pleasure in life.

column3: 就弹那半闺 山居吟 吧
column6: Will you play the fist verse of  The Mountain Life.
I disappointed Your Majesty.
I hope I did not incur ridicule for my poor playing.

column3: 琴音精妙 只是你心有旁鹜
column6:
The playing was fine.
You were simply abstracted.

column3: 心思没有全然付与此琴
column6: You did not devote all your heart to the zither.

column3: 臣妾辜负此琴 还请皇上恕罪
column6:
I do beg Your Majesty's pardon
for my failure to commit to the music.

It was your first time playing the zither.
I understand that you were unacquainted with it.

column3: 不过朕倒另有一个疑惑
column6: But I have another question in mind.

column3: 你对朕的情意朕已经明了
column6: Your love for me, I can clearly perceive.
But I was wondering when you began to feel love for me.

column3: 臣妾看见的是臣妾面前的这个人
column6: What I see is the person now sitting before me
regardless of his name or title.
What do you mean?

When Your Majesty, in the name of His Lordship,
extended your appreciation for my music in the garden,

I kept a respectful distance
even though I admired your flair.

column3: 不敢越了规矩多加亲近

column6:
After disclosing your identity,
Your Majesty took greater care of me

column3: 并非只是对其他妃嫔一般对待
column6: and treated me differently from the other concubines.

column3: 臣妾对皇上不只是君臣之礼

column6:
That is why I not only see Your Majesty
as the monarch, but also as my husband.

column3: 臣妾是何时对皇上动情的
column6: If I must tell Your Majesty the exact time,

column3: 是在皇上解余氏之困之时
column6:
it was when Your Majesty helped me out
when I was cornered by Yu in the garden.
I was utterly flustered at that moment.

column3: 虽然这对您来讲只是举手之劳
column6: While it was as easy as lifting a finger for Your Majesty,

column3: 皇上是救人于危困的君子
column6: in my eyes, Your Majesty was my savior.

column3: 朕不过是随口一问罢了
column6: I was just asking.
I hope Your Majesty would allow me to finish.

column3: 臣妾死罪 说句冒犯皇上的话
column6: This might be a capital offence to Your Majesty.
I do revere you as the emperor,

column3: 视作臣妾的夫君来爱重
column6: but I regard you more as my loving husband.

column3: 朕何尝不知道你的心思
column6: I have always known that.
That is why I hold you dear to my heart.

column3: 嬛嬛 今日的事是朕多疑了
column6: Huan Huan, I was having undue suspicions.
Please don't blame me.
Si Lang.

column3: 把小主与皇上当年的私事

column6:
My Lady, do you feel that someone revealed
your personal anecdote to Lady Cao?

It is just a doubt that I have.
There's no evidence.

column3: 只有和小主最亲近的人才知道
column6: (sigh) But only people closest to you would know such a tidbit.

column3: 连奴婢也是今天才得知此事
column6: I wasn't aware of it until today.
I believe Vermilion was the only witness in the garden.

column3: 是小主从娘家带来的陪嫁丫头啊
column6: But she is a dowry maid of yours, My Lady.

column3: 可是流朱跟了我这么多年
column6: I know.

column3: 我是信得过的 是啊
column6:
But I have confidence in Vermilion
after all these years living with her.

column3: 她绝不会与曹琴默牵连在一起
column6: Yes, indeed.
She will never collude with Cao Qinmo against me.

column3: 莫非是流朱姑娘心直口快
column6: I agree, My Lady.

column3: 一不小心说与了旁人听
column6:
Vermilion is a straightforward girl.
She might have brought it up to someone else.
But her unintentional words fell on a purposeful ear
so that the tidbit was passed on to Lady Cao.

column3: 思来想去 也只有这个解释了
column6: That might be the only way to explain it.
It was fortunate that His Majesty trusted me.

column3: 我恐怕要死无葬身之地了
column6:
Otherwise, I would be a goner
in face of the repeated rumor.
Absolutely.

column3: 只要皇上信得小主就好
column6: Above all else, you've earned His Majesty's trust, My Lady.

column3: 娘娘 奴婢已经按照您的吩咐
让御膳房减少各宫各院的例菜
column6:
At Your Majesty's behest, I have instructed the
Imperial Kitchen to reduce the food ration for every palace
and increase the use of vegetables.

column3: 好啊 皇上要后宫节俭

column6:
Very well. I must set an example
as His Majesty requires frugality in the harem.
Certainly.

As for the highest-ranking concubines,
Consort Fleur and Consort Astuce,

column3: 其他妃嫔才会心服口服的
column6: they will have to have the same ration as mine
so that the other concubines may willingly follow suit.
That is a great idea, Your Majesty.
It was not my idea.

column3: 是沈贵人在皇上跟前儿提的
column6: It was Lady Shen who brought it up to His Majesty.
I must not take the credit for her kind thought.

column3: 奴婢从御膳房拿了点心来了
column6:
Your Highness, I brought you
desserts from the Imperial Kitchen.
It's all right to have less desserts,

column3: 怎么本宫喜欢的蟹粉酥都没有啊
column6: but they should at least make the crab puffs for me!

column3: 御膳房的人说蟹粉贵得很
column6:
The kitchen staff said that crab meat
is too expensive in the summer.

column3: 不许再用这些贵价的点心了
column6:
They will stop making such desserts
at the Empress's command.
They have already halved the daily ration.

column3: 连点心都这么小家子气
column6: What's all this small-mindedness with the desserts?

column3: 行宫不比宫里什么都齐全
column6: (huff) Your Highness, please don't be mad.
The Summer Palace is not as well-provided as home.
The Empress is always stingy.
You can count the concubines here on one hand.
How much can we possibly consume?

column3: 什么醋黄瓜 凉拌金针
column6: We've been having vegetarian meals all day.
Needle mushroom salad after smashed cucumbers.
I didn't even see a single piece of meat!

column3: 没些个好东西 更不用吃了
column6: My appetite is already suppressed by the summer heat.

column3: 奴婢听说皇后宫里也是这样的
column6: Now I don't even have to eat!

column3: 都是那个沈贵人的主意
column6: I learnt that it is the same with the Empress's palace.

column3: 劝了皇上要裁减例菜呢
column6:
It was all Lady Shen's idea. She suggested
to His Majesty that we halve the food ration.

column3: 就学会拿着鸡毛当令箭了
column6:
She's not yet in the place to manage the palace.
But doesn't she know how to rule?

- Song Zhi.
- Yes.
Distribute some money among the servants.

column3: 给那些宫女太监们补贴点油水
column6: They deserve to eat well on such a hot day.

column3: 采月她们新做的酸梅汤
我觉得不错 比御膳房的要好
column6:
Lunar made me some prune tea.
It tastes better than what the Imperial Kitchen makes.
You should try it!

column3: 姐姐忘了 我是不爱吃酸的
column6: You forgot that I don't like sour food, didn't you?
Oh, sorry about that.

column3: 小主睡前就喝了四五碗
column6: In that case, I'll have yours.

My Lady, you've had four or five servings already.
It might cause stomach pain.

column3: 但今天热 我就爱喝这个
column6: All right then.

column3: 那是茯苓的酸梅汤做得好
column6: I just couldn't help drinking it on a hot day.
Poria is very good at making prune tea.
Who is Poria?
She was sent to serve My Lady in the Summer Palace.

column3: 温宜公主下个月十九满周岁
column6:
Princess Wenyi will have her
